comment.author: 22877978@N07
comment._content: This aircraft is a Stinson SR-5A, 9482-A, Civil Reg: NC14179. Stinson built the SR-5 series Reliants in 1935.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks EricTS. We will consider adding your information. We’ll need to change the source data so that we can keep the information we show here in Flickr and in our own catalog ( http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html) in sync.
